meta.name: Hidden Assets
meta.description: Hidden Assets is about family, power and the corrosive effects of boundless greed - a story set in Co Clare, small town Ireland and the world's diamond capital, Antwerp.A routine raid led by Emer Berry, a detective in the Irish Criminal Assets Bureau, reveals that a small-time drug dealer has been receiving substantial funding from a seemingly untraceable source – not in cash, but in rough diamonds. When these diamonds are linked to a series of bombings in Belgium, Emer is forced to work with Police Commissioner Christian De Jong. Eventually, reluctantly banding together, they unravel a political conspiracy fuelling domestic unrest for financial gain; caught up in this web of greed are the Brannigans, a wealthy Irish dynasty with ties to Antwerp. Drawn into a battle of wits with the family, Emer, Christian, and the CAB team must follow the money to stop another terrorist attack – before it's too late.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Tipped off, Pearse diverts the truck however, the police seize the drugs as they're unloaded. Niamh admits Tar Le used K.Y.V. to remove waste.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: A police raid in Limerick, a dead body in Antwerp and a terrorist bombing campaign. Detective Emer Berry and her team must work out how they are all connected.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: With Darren Reid dead and the discovery that another bombing is imminent, Emer and Christian's attention is drawn to a well-known Irish businessman with a very chequered past.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Emer has Fionn Brannigan firmly in her sights. As the net closes in around him, Bibi is feeling the pressure too. Especially when her wayward brother reaches out for help.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Emer's in Antwerp to help search for Fionn Brannigan. It looks like she and Christian have hit a dead end until a forensics breakthrough changes everything.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: While her team follow the money trail in Ireland, Emer and Christian discover the real identity of the bombers. And a very unexpected source provides the investigation with invaluable information.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Emer and Christian face a desperate race against time to stop the final bombing and uncover who was really behind the terrorist campaign.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The new lead detective of Ireland's Criminal Assets Bureau faces an immediate challenge after a co-ordinated cyber-attack targets her agency and Belgium's Counter-Terrorist Unit, seemingly in connection to the Brannigan case. Bibi Melnick resurfaces with some new and crucial information unveiling dark details on how her father-in-law Richard ran his company Trestford and reveals there's a mole in CTU.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: DS Claire Wallace and CI Christian De Jong are shocked to discover who was behind the terrorist attacks, but as the body count grows, will they be able to prove it?

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Bibi Brannigan's life hangs in the balance when a hitman arrives in Ireland. A PR disaster threatens Frances Swann's plans, forcing her to take drastic action.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: In the aftermath of a chilling attack in Ireland, Claire heads to Antwerp to make contact with a key witness. When Christian hits a dead end in his investigation, help comes from an unexpected source.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: As Claire and Christian close in on hard evidence connecting Trestford to the bombings, Frances Swann executes a callous plan to force Bibi to Antwerp.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Claire and her CAB team are racing against time to uncover those responsible for the terrorist attacks prior to the Antwerp port agreement is agreed upon. But their discovery comes with a huge cost.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: When investigative reporter Olatz Alzola and her family are brutally murdered in Bilbao, DS Claire Wallace is drawn into a case that links their killings to a CAB raid in Ireland.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Claire questions a hostile Alice while Jon and Claire investigate Adama's student residence, finding it ransacked by O'Neill. Separately, forensic accountant, Norah Dillon, discovers that Nick was funneling money into a Liechtenstein account, and CAB Detective Liam Boylan finds CCTV footage of a man arguing with Nick.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: An envelope Adama sent to his supervisor, Romero, goes missing.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Bruno is caught by police at Sanihaz, the medical waste facility Olatz had visited. He claims his cousin Tomas was responsible for the people-smuggling and murders.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: O'Neill is hospitalised due to exposure to medical waste. Police raid haulage company K.Y.V., where O'Neill worked as a driver on Pearse's recommendation

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Tipped off, Pearse diverts the truck however, the police seize the drugs as they're unloaded. Niamh admits Tar Le used K.Y.V. to remove waste.
